name: ExamCell
description: ExamCell is an AI-powered online exam monitoring system designed to enhance academic integrity. It allows institutes to conduct secure online exams with real-time face tracking, automated cheating detection, and role-based access control. Students can take exams within a controlled environment, while teachers and admins can monitor activities in real-time. The system ensures fair assessments through auto-submission on multiple violations, detailed analytics, and seamless user experience with React and NestJS integration.
